title: Do You Remember BEATS??? - Fit Pro
description: Head to  and activate Honey for free to start saving today! Thanks to Honey for sponsoring this video.  Beats used to be the titan in personal audio as you see their headphones and earbuds everywhere you go; TV shows, movies, that person on the bus. Today they are a bit hidden away after Apple acquired them years ago, but the Beats Fit Pro feels like they still pack a punch!
